Description of incident: After Delta Air Lines and Sears Holdings, Best Buy has also come forward to warn customers that their payment card information may have been compromised as a result of a breach suffered by online services provider [24]7.ai.Similar to Delta and Sears, Best Buy contracted [24]7.ai for online chat/support services. The retailer says it will contact impacted customers and provide free credit monitoring if needed.Best Buy has not specified exactly how many of its customers are impacted, but noted that “only a small fraction of our overall online customer population could have been caught up in this [24]7.ai incident, whether or not they used the chat function.”
